Get To Know Me

I want to learn how to box and I will try to learn how to Snowboard next year. Although I really love doing those things my true Passion lies in coding. I am always trying to improve my skills by building cool Projects. I enjoy learning new Technologies and im currently trying to master the art of Web Development
